title: Monitoring alterations of all-trans-retinal in human brain cancer cells by label-free confocal Raman imaging: regulation of the redox status of cytochrome c
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20982-20991
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01542H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Karolina Jarczewska, Monika Kopeć, Halina Abramczyk, Jakub Maciej Surmacki
This article has shown the impact of all-trans-retinal on human brain cancer, which is apparent in the shifts in the redox status of cytochrome c in a single cell.
